```js
class MonthPickerExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { open: false, month: 2, year: 2018 };
    this.handleOpen = this.handleOpen.bind(this);
    this.handleCancel = this.handleCancel.bind(this);
    this.handleOK = this.handleOK.bind(this);
  }

  handleOpen() {
    this.setState({ open: true });
  }

  handleCancel() {
    this.setState({ open: false });
  }

  handleOK(month, year) {
    this.setState({ open: false, month, year });
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <Button onClick={this.handleOpen}>Open</Button>
        <MonthPicker
          open={this.state.open}
          onCancel={this.handleCancel}
          title="View Previous Statements"
          month={this.state.month}
          year={this.state.year}
          years={[2018, 2019, 2020]}
          onOK={this.handleOK}
        />
        <p>Selected month: {this.state.month}</p>
        <p>Selected year: {this.state.year}</p>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<MonthPickerExample />;
```
